alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:30AM CST until January 13 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Paducah...Olmsted Lock and Dam...and Cairo For the Ohio River...including Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 39.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 40.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
